title: Social media’s decline is journalism’s hope
description: It’s ugly out there: At a time when over 50% of Americans get their news from social media like YouTube, Facebook, or TikTok, the very same platforms get flooded by generative AI slop, increasingly creating an experience that feels like a fever dream. Personal posts and news are sandwiched in between genAI babies talking to...
